name: Strawberry, Gin, Campari and Lime Slushito
description: This recipe from Adam Bernbach of Estadio in Washington, D.C. is a decidedly grown up take on the frozen drink. Campari and lime temper the sweetness from the strawberries, and gin cuts through with a touch of herbs.
recipeIngredient: 3 ounces fresh lime juice (from 4 to 6 limes)

recipeInstructions.text: To make the strawberry syrup: Place the strawberries and simple syrup in a sealable container. Let sit overnight in refrigerator. Crush berries lightly into syrup, then strain.
For the cocktail: Combine 5 ounces strawberry syrup, gin, Campari, lime juice, and 1 quart ice in the jar of a blender. Blend until ice is completely broken up and the mixture is smooth.
Divide mixture between 4 serving glasses. Garnish each glass with a basil leaf.
